org.gradoop.temporal.model.impl.operators.matching.common.statistics

Interface TemporalGraphStatisticsFactory<T extends TemporalGraphStatistics>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of TemporalGraphStatistics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinningTemporalGraphStatisticsFactory, DummyTemporalGraphStatisticsFactory

    public interface TemporalGraphStatisticsFactory<T extends TemporalGraphStatistics>
    Abstract base class for factories for TemporalGraphStatistics

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T fromGraph(TemporalGraph g)
      Create statistics from a temporal graph
      T fromGraph(TemporalGraph g, Set<String> numericalProperties, Set<String> categoricalProperties)
      Create statistics from a temporal graph, specifying numerical and categorical properties to consider explicitly
      T fromGraphWithSampling(TemporalGraph g, int sampleSize)
      Create statistics from a temporal graph based on a sample of given size
      T fromGraphWithSampling(TemporalGraph g, int sampleSize, Set<String> numericalProperties, Set<String> categoricalProperties)
      Create statistics from a temporal graph based on a sample of given size.

                        int sampleSize)
                 throws Exception
        Create statistics from a temporal graph based on a sample of given size
        Parameters:
        g - graph to create statistics for
        sampleSize - size of sample to be used
        Returns:

      • fromGraphWithSampling

        T fromGraphWithSampling(TemporalGraph g,
                        int sampleSize,
                        Set<String> numericalProperties,
                        Set<String> categoricalProperties)
                 throws Exception
        Create statistics from a temporal graph based on a sample of given size. Numerical and categorical properties to be considered are specified explicitly.
        Parameters:
        g - graph to create statistics for
        numericalProperties - list of numerical properties to consider
        categoricalProperties - list of categorical properties to consider
        sampleSize - size of sample to be used
        Returns:
        graph statistics
        Throws:
        Exception - if anything flink-related goes wrong
